quests.desc: Welcome to another life changing game of TextWorld! First, it would be good if you could make an effort to take a trip south. Then, make an attempt to travel east. With that accomplished, try to travel north. Following that, attempt to go east. After that, try to move east. With that accomplished, make an attempt to venture south. Then, make an effort to take a trip west. And then, recover the loaf of bread from the cabinet. If you can get your hands on the loaf of bread, go to the north. That done, eat the loaf of bread. And if you do that, you're the winner!
commands: take loaf of bread from cabinet
take loaf of bread from cabinet

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You arrive in a salon. An usual one.

 You see a couch. The couch is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_0] On the couch you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a steam room. A normal one.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
Wow! You're in a garage. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You make out a spherical box.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The spherical box contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The spherical box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a bedroom.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in the cubicle. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You can see a locker. Wow, check out the price tag glued to the locker! Thirty dollars![if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if] You can make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] normal looking non-euclidean box in the room.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The non-euclidean box contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The non-euclidean box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] Hey, want to see a mantle? Look over there, a mantle. The mantle is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the mantle you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the mantle.[end if] You make out a bookshelf. Now why would someone leave that there? The bookshelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the bookshelf you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a studio. A standard kind of place. The room is well lit.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the bar.

 You make out [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] dresser.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_4]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You make out a desk. The desk is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_3] On the desk you can see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You're now in the office. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] portmanteau.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_6]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The portmanteau is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

You move on, clearly infuriated by your TextWorld experience.[end if]

walkthrough: take loaf of bread from cabinet

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! First step, make an effort to travel south. And then, travel east. And then, take a trip north. After that, make an effort to move east. And then, make an effort to go east. Then, make an attempt to go south. After that, attempt to go to the west. Then, retrieve the loaf of bread from the cabinet. And then, eat the loaf of bread. And if you do that, you're the winner!
